newsitem.title: UK: IPE natgas active in Q1, Q2 '98, direction mixed.
newsitem.headline: IPE natgas active in Q1, Q2 '98, direction mixed.

text.p: IPE natural gas futures were actively traded on Monday morning, with the focus of interest on the first and second quarters of next year.
Levels in Q1 1998 eased back, with the hardest falls posted on the January contract which shed 0.075 pence a therm (p/th) trade at 18.675 p/th.
But levels in the second quarter were stronger, with June gaining 0.220 p/th to last trade at 10.75 p/th.
"We're just seeing the curve flatten out slightly with the summer coming up and winter easing a bit," said one broker.
A total of 175 lots were traded in the morning session. The market was quiet on Friday having traded a record volume of 960 lots on Thursday.
